description:
In the game 1989, made in a Ubisoft Game Jam circa 2015 (I honestly cannot remember when we created it), you take control of the network of a city against up to 5 other players online.

The win condition: Eliminate all of your opponents from the network.

You need to click the link between two nodes to assign hacking power to expand your web. The game is similar in gameplay to Mushroom Wars.

Enjoy!
